se.jguru.nazgul.core.osgi.launcher.api.event

Interface BundleContextHolder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    se.jguru.nazgul.core.clustering.api.Clusterable, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlueprintServiceEventAdapter

    public interface BundleContextHolder
extends se.jguru.nazgul.core.clustering.api.Clusterable
    Event callback specification for managing BundleContext instances.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void register(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context)
      Registers the provided BundleContext to this BundleContextHolder instance.
      void unregister(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context)

    • Method Detail

      • register

        void register(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context)
        Registers the provided BundleContext to this BundleContextHolder instance.
        Parameters:
        context - The BundleContext which should be registered to this BundleContextHolder.

      • unregister

        void unregister(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context)
        Un-registers the provided BundleContext from this BundleContextHolder instance.
        Parameters:
        context - The BundleContext which should be un-registered from this BundleContextHolder.
